[231] Power of Two  	(File: 231.power-of-two.py)

https://leetcode.com/problems/power-of-two

* Easy (40.00%)
* Total Accepted:    NaN
* Total Submissions: NaN
* Testcase Example:  '1'


Given an integer, write a function to determine if it is a power of two.
